comments.raw_text:
1) Select a message from one of your accounts.
2) Select the "Tag" icon in the toolbar. Use the dropdown widget and select "Important."
3) On Windows, hold the Control Key and select the "To Do" tag. 

Results :
I get the nice customize menu

Expected results :
I should be able to select more than one tag.

I filling the bug based on https://litmus.mozilla.org/show_test.cgi?id=14229. Simplest solution would be to update the test as this seemed to be a windows only feature. 

Bryan Thoughts ?
